name: MouseEvent.pageY
description: The pageY read-only property of the MouseEvent interface returns the Y (vertical) coordinate in pixels of the event relative to the whole document. This property takes into account any vertical scrolling of the page.

refs.name: CSS Object Model (CSSOM) View Module
refs.description: The definition of 'pageY' in the 'CSS Object Model (CSSOM) View Module' specification.

refs.name: Touch Events
refs.description: The definition of 'pageY' in the 'Touch Events' specification.
